original_text: Elijah replied, ‘The Israelites have turned away from the covenant that you made with them. They have destroyed your altars. They have killed your prophets with swords. But I have always served the Lord God Almighty faithfully. Now I am the only prophet that is still alive and they are trying to kill me too.’
korean_text: 그가 대답하되 내가 만군의 하나님 여호와께 열심이 유별하오니 이는 이스라엘 자손이 주의 언약을 버리고 주의 제단을 헐며 칼로 주의 선지자들을 죽였음이오며 오직 나만 남았거늘 그들이 내 생명을 찾아 빼앗으려 하나이다

sentences.original_text: The Israelites have turned away from the covenant
They have killed your prophets with swords
But I have always served the Lord God Almighty
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 항상 전능하신 주 하나님을 섬겼습니다

sentences.original_text: Now I am the only prophet
and they are trying to kill me too
